name: Solar Empire
startIntroPart1: The Solar Empire is a pacific nation, ruled by Empress Qa-len, looking for the peace between all the Earth. The great technological advances of this nation have made it one of the greatest influences on the world stage.
startIntroPart2: Great leader, is your time to put this nation to the rise. Use the power of the sun as your allie and make the peace throught the world.
declaringWar: I am not fine with this, but war is war.
attacked: You thouhght just because we are peaceful, you can just attack us without a massive counterattack? So let's see how this will end...
defeated: I don't belive it. Our thecnologies wasn't stronger then the enemies arms.
introduction: Hello. We are a peacefull nation. If you don't bother us, we can be friends in the future!
neutralYes: Thanks, we accept your offer with gratitude.
hateLetsHearIt: What do you say about this?
hateNo: We are not agreeing to that!
We can't accept from unfriendly nations.
afterPeace: At least peace. This is better for everyone.
tradeRequest: Our nation has a comercial offer to you. We think you will like it.
uniques: When declaring friendship, both parties gain a [+30]% boost to great person generation
Receive a tech boost when scientific buildings/wonders are built in capital
